rules.rationale: Consistent formatting improves tracking and reporting

rules.description: Add year-month for campaigns with end dates
rules.rationale: Dates help distinguish similar campaigns over time

rules.description: No spaces, underscores, or special chars
rules.rationale: Special characters can break tracking systems

rules.description: Same campaign name across all channels
Add channel suffix only if necessary for differentiation
rules.rationale: Channel identifiers help when same campaign runs on multiple channels

rules.description: Include product or service name when relevant
rules.rationale: Product names help identify campaign purpose
